relatedBlades.title: Discover shadow IT & AI with Cloudflare
relatedBlades.subtitle: Enhance visibility and control with a unified platform
relatedBlades.copy:
SaaS applications provide the flexibility and agility you need for supporting your hybrid workforce. But the use of unauthorized SaaS apps and AI tools can introduce new security risks.

Cloudflare's SASE platform simplifies managing SaaS app access, including GenAI and modern collaboration tools, from anywhere in the world. You can increase visibility into app usage, tightly control access, and protect data — while still ensuring employees have the tools they need to be productive.

subMenuItems.linkText: Gartner® Magic Quadrant™ for Security Service Edge (SSE), 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Security Service Edge Solutions, Q1 2024
Forrester Wave™ for Zero Trust Platforms, Q3 2023

KuppingerCole Leadership Compass for SASE Integration Suites, 2023
Forrester Opportunity Shapshot: Leverage Zero Trust To Combat Multichannel Phishing Threats

features.title: Shadow IT leaves your IT team in the dark
features.description: When your IT team can't see the SaaS applications your employees are using, they can't protect the data that lives within those applications.

features.title: SaaS applications live outside of your team's control
features.description: SaaS apps are hosted outside of the corporate network, so your IT team has limited control over the way users access those applications and move data in and out of them.

features.title: Users may share data across the wrong applications
features.description: When employees access the wrong instance of applications, they can store and share your data in the wrong places — opening the door to potential data leaks and other security threats.

relatedBlades.title: How it works
relatedBlades.copy: Cloudflare places Zero Trust access (ZTNA), gateway (SWG), and browser (RBI) controls in front of your SaaS applications — without requiring your IT team to configure and operate a dedicated CASB product.

relatedBlades.title: Track and analyze the applications your employees use
relatedBlades.copy: Detect, catalogue, and manage all approved and unapproved applications within your organization, while maintaining full visibility over every connection and request in one centralized location.

contentfulAsset.description: Protect your website visitors from script-based attacks and data theft.

relatedBlades.title: Apply Zero Trust security to every SaaS application
relatedBlades.copy: Layer [Zero Trust security measures](https://www.cloudflare.com/learning/security/glossary/what-is-zero-trust/) in front of your SaaS applications, authenticating legitimate users and stopping unauthorized users or risky devices from accessing sensitive files and data.

relatedBlades.title: Protect data within your corporate applications
relatedBlades.copy: Easily build and deploy Zero Trust policies to protect the data that lives within your SaaS tenants, while preventing your employees from accessing non-corporate instances of applications.
